extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Mid-Ocean Ridges in plate tectonics and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have Redundancy
extended_metaphor.mid-ocean_ridges: Mid-Ocean Ridges facilitate the expansion of the Earth's crust by forming new oceanic crust at the diverging boundaries to ensure continuous generation of new crust.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: Similarly, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man provides redundancy by continuously generating energy to power the suit, ensuring Tony Stark's abilities and protection are always available.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Mid-Ocean Ridges in plate tectonics and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have Resilience
extended_metaphor.mid-ocean_ridges: Mid-Ocean Ridges help maintain the balance of the Earth's crust by continuously generating new crust at the diverging boundaries.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: In the same way, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man demonstrates resilience by sustaining energy production even under extreme conditions, allowing Iron Man to overcome challenges and adversaries.
